ext_descriptions.ext_description: A boolean_value is used for selecting Boolean measured value.
A surface_boundary_type allows selection of a surface parameter terminal.
the selected boundary is the minimum value of the u parameter.
the selected boundary is the minimum value of the v parameter.
the selected boundary is the maximum value of the u parameter.
the selected boundary is the maximum value of the v parameter.
An u_or_v_parameter allows selection of a parameter representing a surface.
the selected parameter is u parameter.
the selected parameter is v parameter.

A B_spline_curve_knot_locator is the representation of a location by specifying an index of the knot array of the identified . This entity is used to represent the location where the extreme value was measured.
The and knot array are defined in .
a on which the measurement was performed.
the start index of the segment in the knot array of the where the extreme value was measured.
The that uses the specified in shall be the of the that is related to that has containing an instance of this entity as its location of extreme value.

A B_spline_curve_segment is the representation of a location by specifying a knot span of the identified where parameter is larger than or equal to ()th knot and less or equal to (+1)th knot. This entity is used to represent the location where the extreme value was measured.
The and knot array are defined in .
a on which the measurement was performed.

the start index of the knot array of the where the extreme value was measured. If the is i, then it shall be understood that portion of the curve is represented where parameter is larger than i-th knot and smaller than i+1-th knot of the .
The that uses the specified in shall be the of the that is related to that has containing an instance of this entity as its location of extreme value.

A B_spline_surface_knot_locator is the representation of a location by specifying an index of the knot array and a direction in the parametric space of the identified . This entity is used to represent the location where the extreme value was measured.
The and knot array are defined in .
a on which the measurement was performed.
an index of the knot array of the where the extreme value was measured.
a where the corresponds.
The that uses the specified in shall be the of the that is related to that has containing an instance of this entity as its location of extreme value.

A B_spline_surface_patch is the representation of a location by specifying a patch with u, v knot indices on the identified . This entity is used to represent where the extreme value was measured.
The and knot array are defined in .
a on which the measurement was performed.
the start index of the surface patch in the knot array in u parameter of where the extreme value was measured.

ext_description.p: the start index of the surface patch in the knot array in v parameter of where the extreme value was measured.
ext_description.note: If the is i and the is j, then it shall be understood that the portion of the surface is represented where u parameter is larger than or equal to i-th knot and is smaller than or equal to i+1-th knot, and v parameter is larger than or equal to j-th knot and is smaller than or equal to j+1-th knot.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The that uses the specified in shall be the of the that is related to that has containing an instance of this entity as its location of extreme value.
A B_spline_surface_strip is the representation of a location by specifying a surface strip of the identified . This entity is used to represent the location where the extreme value was measured.
a on which the measurement was performed.

the start index of the surface strip in the knot array in u or v parameter of where the extreme value was measured. If the is i, then it shall be understood that portion of the surface is represented where the u or v parameter specified by is larger than i-th knot and smaller than i+1-th knot of the .

ext_description.note: The and knot array are defined in .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The that uses the specified in shall be the of the that is related to that has containing an instance of this entity as its location of extreme value.

A Boundary_curve_of_b_spline_or_rectangular_composite_surface is the representation of a location by specifying a boundary of the parametric space of the identified surface. The entity is used to represent the location where the extreme value is measured.

a or a
on which the measurement was performed.
a type of the boundary of the parametric space of where the extreme value was measured.

The that uses the or
specified in shall be the of the that is related to that has containing an instance of this entity as its location of extreme value.

A Composite_curve_transition_locator is the representation of a location by specifying an index of connecting point between two segments in the identified . This entity is used to represent the location where the extreme value was measured.
The is defined in .
a on which the measurement was performed.
an index of the connecting point of where the extreme value was measured. If is j, then it shall be understood that the connecting point between j-th segment and j+1-th segment is represented.
The that uses the specified in shall be the of the that is related to that has containing an instance of this entity as its location of extreme value.
An Extreme_instance is the representation of a pair of extreme measured value and related location information where it was detected.
one or more that represents the location where the extreme value was detected.

ext_description.p: a that represents the extreme value obtained by the measurement.
ext_description.example: When a gap between edge and base surface is measured, includes two points, one is a point on the edge and the other is a point on the base surface. The extreme value represented by the is the distance between these two points.
ext_description.note: Each entity defined in has a rule to specify what type of to require.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: An Instance_report_item_with_extreme_instances is a type of and has the information on pairs of extreme value and its location.

a list of s that is a pair of extreme value and its location detected by the measurement. The extreme value is the measured value that causes quality defect, namely satisfaction of the criterion concerned, or the measured value that is close to the threshold though the criterion is not satisfied.
A Plane_angle_and_length_pair is the representation of the measured value that consists of a and a distance. This entity is used to represent the difference of two s.
a .
a .

A Plane_angle_and_ratio_pair is the representation of the measured value that consists of a and a ratio of curvature radius change. This entity is used to represent the difference of curvature which requires the difference between directions of principal vector as well as the difference of curvature radius values. Let r1 and r2 be curvature radii to be compared, ratio of curvature radius change is given by (2|r1-r2|)/(|r1|+|r2|).
a .

a ,
ratio of curvature radius change.
A Point_on_edge_curve is a type of and represents the location on the identified where the extreme value was measured.
an on which the measurement was performed.
a that is the basis curve to which the parameter value of the location relates. This is derived from the of .
The that uses the specified in of this entity shall be the of the that is related to that has containing an instance of this entity as its location of extreme value.
A Point_on_face_surface is a type of and represents the location on the identified where the extreme value was measured.
a on which the measurement was performed.
a that is the basis surface to which the parameter value of the location relates. This is derived from the of .
The that uses the specified in shall be the of the that is related to that has containing an instance of this entity as its location of extreme value.

A Rectangular_composite_surface_transition_locator is the representation of a location by specifying an index of connecting segments between two patches in the identified .
This entity is used to represent the location where the extreme value was measured.
a that indicates the boundary segment of the specified patch.
a on which the measurement was performed.

an index of the patches in u-direction of basis_surface
where the extreme value was measured.

an index of the patches in v-direction of basis_surface
where the extreme value was measured.

If the
is i and the
is j and the
is , then it shall be understood that the transition between [i][j]
and [i+1][j]
is represented. If the
is i and the
is j and the
is , then it shall be understood that the transition between [i][j] and [i][j+1]

The that uses the
specified in basis_surface

A Shape_data_quality_inspected_shape_and_result_relationship is a type of
and it represents the relationship between
representing the inspection results and representing the inspection target product shape data.
a representing the product shape data inspected.
a representing the result of data quality inspection for the product shape data represented by attribute.

ext_description.p: There shall be at least one common among those retrieved starting from the attribute and those where the specified by the attribute belongs.
ext_description.note: The relationship between and inspected is captured by the two relationship entities defined in , namely, which relates and and which relates and .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The context of specified by the attribute and the context of specified by the attribute shall be identical.
A Shape_data_quality_inspection_criterion_report is a type of and represents summarized information on the result of inspection for a specific shape data quality criterion.
a for selecting a representative extreme value from among the measured values for the criterion.

A Shape_data_quality_inspection_instance_report is a type of and represents detailed inspection report of the product shape data for a specific criterion. It contains a list of s, each representing inspection result of an inspected shape element or a pair of shape elements.

ext_description.note: Expected quantity and order of s in the list of this attribute can be controlled by as defined in .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: A Shape_data_quality_inspection_instance_report_item is a type of and represents the detailed information obtained for each inspected element or a pair of elements of product shape data.
one or more that represent data types of the shape elements inspected.

ext_description.p: a that represents the measured value obtained by the inspection.
ext_description.note: The types of and are specified in each entity defined in .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: A Shape_data_quality_inspection_result is a type of defined in and represents the inspection result for a specific criterion on shape data quality.
a for which the inspection was performed.
A Shape_data_quality_inspection_result_representation is a type of defined in , and represents all the inspection results for an inspected product data against a set of shape data quality criteria.
At least one instance of that belongs to a shall be of type .

The context of this entity shall be of type
as defined in schema.
At least one instance of associated with this entity shall exist.
A Shape_inspection_result_accuracy_association is the representation of the relationship between and the accuracy applied by the inspection.

ext_description.p: a applied by the inspection specifically for the criterion.
ext_description.note: Applied accuracy that is not specific to the criterion but common to all the criteria inspected is provided by the attribute of the entity .
If is specified by the entity and is also specified by the instantiation of this entity, then the latter supersedes the former for the criterion.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: a that represents the result of inspection for the criterion.
A Shape_inspection_result_representation_with_accuracy is a type of and has the information of common accuracy applied to all the measurements.

ext_description.p: common accuracy applied to all the measurements for inspecting specified product data against specified set of criteria.
ext_description.note: For representing the accuracy applied to the measurement against a particular criterion, the attribute associated by is provided and it supersedes the accuracy defined by this entity if present.

ext_descriptions.ext_description:
The function relating_geometric_models_of_extreme_values finds all s on which inspection was performed and
were created. An instance of
is given as an input argument of this function.

an instance of
for which related s to be found.

The function using_product_view_definition_of_geometric_model finds all the
instances that use a specified
instance.

an instance of
whose corresponding
instances are to be sought.
